hero.h1: Hi there, i am Claudio Bustos

about-me.title: Meet Claudio Bustos
about-me.introduction: I am a Systems Analyst student, I am dedicated to software development, at the moment I am studying a Systems Analyst career and doing an internship, among my hobbies I like to draw, do calisthenics and distract myself with video games

s1.title: Web Development
s1.body: These are my Frontend technology skills.

s2.title: Other Knowledge
s2.body: I also have knowledge in other technologies

e1.description: I am in charge of developing functional generic components and creating functions that are then incorporated into the main system, I do this using Next js, in addition to other technologies such as JsonForms and MUI Component Library, I also create microservices to maintain a Graphql API that uses MongoDb.

e2.description: I am developing a multi-user web system with client/server architecture using the Laravel framework based on PHP.

proyects.title: My recent projects
proyects.default: image of another project coming soon

contact.t2: Contact me to start your web development project and I will be glad to help you.

footer.t1: I learn and create every day.
